intheworks.title: Automatic Player Deletion
intheworks.text: ~~This feature will automatically remove a player from the database when they leave the server~~

intheworks.title: Automatic Database Update
intheworks.text: ~~Will update the UserName section of the discord bot should someone update their discord name~~

footer: I'll try to post one of these every time I start on a new feature, or when one is requested. As always, you can type !help to get a list of commands, and !help <commandname> to get more specific information on a command
